data.lyric:
[ti:Remember You Young]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Remember You Young]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Remember You Young (犹记年少的你) - Thomas Rhett
[00:05.84]Lyrics by：Thomas Rhett/Jesse Frasure/Ashley Gorley
[00:11.68]Composed by：Thomas Rhett/Jesse Frasure/Ashley Gorley
[00:17.53]Hey buddies that I grew up with
[00:21.75]All straight-laced and married up now
[00:26.05]You ain't foolin' me wasn't long ago
[00:29.38]We tore the roof off that one red light town
[00:38.48]And hey darlin' sippin' that red wine
[00:42.75]All classy kicked back on the couch
[00:47.09]You smile and I see ya shootin' tequila
[00:51.32]Us shuttin' them college bars down
[00:55.12]And no matter how much time goes by
[00:59.46]And no matter how much we grow up
[01:04.00]For worse or for better from now 'til forever
[01:08.18]I'll always remember you young
[01:16.18]And hey babies crawlin' on the carpet
[01:20.42]No you won't be that little for long
[01:24.47]One day you'll move away but you're still gonna stay
[01:29.04]This innocent after you're gone
[01:33.02]'Cause no matter how much time goes by
[01:37.07]And no matter how much we grow up
[01:41.80]For worse or for better from now 'til forever
[01:46.03]I'll always remember you young
[01:49.72]Whoa-oh-oh whoa-oh-oh
[01:58.28]Whoa-oh-oh oh oh
[02:07.24]Yeah I hope when we get to Heaven
[02:11.36]He looks at us all like we're kids
[02:15.75]Shameless and painless and perfect and anxious
[02:19.71]Forgives all the wrong that we did
[02:23.52]And no matter how much time goes by
[02:27.62]I know we'll never have to grow up
[02:31.46]We'll say for worse or for better from now 'til forever
[02:36.69]I'll always remember you young
[02:40.42]Whoa-oh-oh oh
[02:45.07]I'll always remember you young
data.trans:
[ti:Remember You Young]
[ar:Thomas Rhett]
[al:Remember You Young]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.84]//
[00:11.68]//
[00:17.53]和我一起长大的兄弟们
[00:21.75]都严于律己 如今他们都已成家立业
[00:26.05]你没有骗我 不久前
[00:29.38]我们在那个小镇里闹得天翻地覆
[00:38.48]亲爱的 喝点红酒吧
[00:42.75]一切都很美好 在沙发上蹦蹦跳跳
[00:47.09]你莞尔一笑 我看见你在喝龙舌兰酒
[00:51.32]我们在大学旁边的酒吧玩到打烊
[00:55.12]不管过了多久
[00:59.46]不管我们什么年纪
[01:04.00]无论如何 我们的友谊永远如初
[01:08.18]我会永远记住你年轻的样子
[01:16.18]孩子们在地毯上爬来爬去
[01:20.42]你们很快也要长大了
[01:24.47]也许有一天 你会搬走 
[01:29.04]即使你离开了 你也会永远保持这份纯真
[01:33.02]不管过了多久
[01:37.07]不管我们什么年纪
[01:41.80]无论如何 我们的友谊永远如初
[01:46.03]我会永远记住你年轻的样子
[01:49.72]//
[01:58.28]//
[02:07.24]希望等我们死后来到天堂
[02:11.36]他看我的眼神一如当初
[02:15.75]没有羞愧和痛苦 完美中带点焦虑
[02:19.71]原谅我们所犯下的错误
[02:23.52]不管过了多久
[02:27.62]我知道 我们可以永远当个小孩
[02:31.46]我们会说 无论如何 我们的友谊永远如初
[02:36.69]我会永远记住你年轻的样子
[02:40.42]//
[02:45.07]我会永远记住你年轻的样子
